ai-patthana21.48:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.48:0.3_0: wrapped in what is associated with pollutants.
ai-patthana21.48:1.1_0: One should not give a teaching to the associated with no floods, nor no resentment, and one uncontrolled in places of loss.
ai-patthana21.48:2.1_0: Not for the sake of preservationing or for its suppression. It doesn’t give rise to satisfaction, repulsion, and for the sake of all that.
ai-patthana21.48:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.48:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.48:3.1_0: Neither Producing the objects of three associated states is the reason why the three roots of the unprofitable roots of the mind. ...”
ai-patthana21.48:3.1_1: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.48:3.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.48:4.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the thought of associated with floods, nor is for the sake of impingement, or for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana21.48:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
